mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_NAME, EMP_NAME, EMP_FILE_PATH FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPT USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO NOT IN (#{emp_no}) ORDER BY DEPT_NAME, EMP_NAME
SELECT DEPT_NAME, EMP_NAME, EMP_FILE_PATH FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN DEPT USING(DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_MEMBER VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(ROOM_NO) ROOM_NO FROM ROOM), (SELECT EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NAME = #{emp_name}) )
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A, (SELECT EMP_NO FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE ROOM_NO = #{room_no}) B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A, (SELECT EMP_NO FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE ROOM_NO = #{room_no}) B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO)
